[b]Portal[/b] is just a classic masterpiece from Valve. A puzzle game where you use portals and physics.

[i]"There really was a cake..."[/i] - GlaDOS

[b][u]Pros:[/u][/b]
- Storyline is great, even though it's not that deep in this Portal game
- Puzzles are well done, which requires logic
- The Soundtrack, when they are being played, is really good
- The portals work fantastically
- Bonus Maps, which are just challenges
- The end credits is so good you don't want to skip it.

[b][u]Neutral:[/u][/b]
- Some aspects of the graphics aged well and some didn't. The game still looks great though even to this day.
- Portal 1 uses some Half-Life 2 assets, the orbits and the citadel sound effects, making the game's atmosphere somewhat sinister and just creepy to play.

[b][u]Cons:[/u][/b]
- Short [i](I was able to finish it below 2 hours)[/i]
- You can cheese some of the test chambers

[b][u]Mod Review:[/u][/b]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/TheBeggarSoldier/recommended/317790?snr=1_5_9__402]Rexaura[/url]

[b]10/10[/b] Who can't say no to Portal? It was innovative at the time and it still is a masterpiece.
I also recommend playing through Portal 2 after this.
um jogo clássico da steam e muito bom e até hoje sua ideia de mecânica ainda impreciona muito a quem joga, com uma história obscura que faz o jogador querer descubrir cada vez mais. muito bom :)
it makes me feel uncomfortable but its fun to try and beat it as fast as you can. also uses assets from hl2 which is pretty epic

One of the best games I've played. Remember that if you're going to get Portal, buy the bundle and get Portal 2 along with it, it is worth it. Despite the age of this game, it holds up to this day. Another good thing, it doesn't even take too long to complete! And then, once you beat the game, and you are like "Well, now what?", you have the bonus stuff. Very good franchise. If you're planning on buying Portal, please, buy the bundle where it gives you Portal 2 also. It also has the bundle discount, and this series is amazing. I recommend this game AND the sequel, they are both AMAZING.
One of the most interesting and fun games you'll ever come across, with one of the best villains ever committed to a video game. You won't regret it - BUY THIS GAME AND PLAY IT.

Reviews seem redundant now.  Yes, there are flaws in this game that prevent it from being perfect (a couple of levels that require fast reactions rather than anything else) and yes, it gets self-indulgent in places (although it does mostly earn it.)
It's still on my list of "10 games everyone should play" though, even after all these years.
